body.name: Groove Life Hero Groove Belt Men's Stretch Nylon Belt with Magnetic Aluminum Buckle, Lifetime Coverage
features: DESIGN - There’s a reason the Groove Belt is our best selling product. This tactical belt is ultra-comfortable and durable, it’s the perfect everyday belt for hard-working moms and dads, athletes, and weekend warriors. The average person adjusts their belt 5+ times per day, but the Groove Belt only needs to be adjusted one time ever.

MATERIALS - Its signature magnetic clasp also makes this the easiest belt to snap on during your morning hustle and wear all day long without hassle. Our tactical belt began with our proprietary webbing, engineered with just the right amount of stretch to keep you secure, yet comfortable. We then added the world’s best belt buckle that clicks seamlessly into place using rare-earth neodymium magnets set in an A380 aluminum alloy.

SIZING - We’ve made it real easy. Just match your pant size and we’ll do the rest. Check out our sizing guide in the product images for additional details. You can always call our customer service department for more assistance! We would love for you to say hi!

NO BS WARRANTY - Adventure and innovation are at the core of who we are. Groove Life products are driven by those values and are designed for a lifestyle of adventure. In the event you adventure too far, and you feel like your Groove product is not living up to your standards, we’ll do what we can to make it right. Our 94 Year No BS Warranty covers any manufacturing damages to your belt. If it's not our bad, (lost, torn, cosmetic, etc.) we’ll cover that too! Replacement fees and taxes may apply.

BORN IN ALASKA. BUILT IN TENNESSEE - Born in the Alaskan wilderness. Adventure Guide Peter Goodwin realized his lifestyle demanded better gear backed by unbelievable customer service. Groove Life was launched in a freezing garage in Port Alsworth, AK. Five years later, Groove Life employs over 200 people in Tennessee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Belt Sizing 2 Men's Ring Sizing 3 Women's Ring Sizing 4 Watch Band Sizing 5 Wallet Sizing

Previous page SPACE-TECH Proprietary webbing, rare earth neodymium magnets and A380 aluminum alloy buckle STIFF-TECH This belt is gonna stay on you like the bad tattoo from your last metal show and not lose its form. ANTI-FLAP For the occasional rogue fly away, we’ve added our secure keeper loop. SNAP-TECH The correct term is neodymium magnets but we like to say Strong as Hell. Just listen to that SNAP! READY FOR ACTION In those moments where you need a quick release… we’ve got you covered. Next page 1 SPACE-TECH 2 STIFF-TECH 3 ANTI-FLAP 4 SNAP-TECH 5 Ready For Action

What's the strength of the Groove Belt magnet? Is it safe around pace makers, phones, etc? The high strength neodymium magnets are N42 magnets. It is safe for use around your phone. We do not recommend our belt if you have a pacemaker or any other medical device that may be affected by magnetic fields. Will the belt set off metal detectors? Are they TSA approved? Yes, they are subject to setting off metal detectors and are not TSA approved. We advise you to remove your belt and wallet before going through the metal detector. How can I clean or care for my Groove Belt? Mild soap and warm water are all you need for cleaning! We recommend cleaning after a fair amount of wearing just to be sure dirt doesn’t hang around. For the belt, a stain remover pen has also been known to do the trick. What size Groove Belt should I order? Match the belt size you order to your pant size! If you're at the high end or on the cusp of a size, we recommend sticking with the size down. For example, if you're right at 36" or right at 37", we'd recommend ordering a medium.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Literally the best belt I’ve ever had!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have owned many belts in my life, really like 100’s. Mainly because I’ve gained and lost significant amounts of weight over the years. This belt is truly remarkable because it’s adjustable but firm and does its job very well. The magnetic buckle is perfect in every way. The belt flexes just enough when you sit down but stays in place very well. If you’re a big guy like me and have belly overhang, it doesn’t dig in to you. Even after long periods of sitting. It’s a really amazing belt all the way around. Just buy it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Discount Code Sleeperdude
reviews.reviewText: Review for Groove Life Belt on Amazon:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I came across the Groove Life belt thanks to a recommendation from Sleeperdude on YouTube, and I must say, it lives up to the hype. The quality and design are impressive, making it stand out from other belts I've owned recently. However, a pro-tip for potential buyers: you can actually snag it at a more affordable price directly from the Groove Life website using the discount code SLEEPERDUDE. Yes, that's S-L-E-E-P-P-E-R-D-U-D-E, all in one word. While it might be on the pricier side, the belt's durability and comfort make it worth every penny. Highly recommend giving it a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well a very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best belts ever owned!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Love the quick release and magnetic hook. Most importantly, it stretches alittle when needed. Got a quick delivery, great price for that quality of product. Plan to buy more for Christmas gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Awesome belt, adjust and fits really nice. I love the clip buckle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this product it’s extremely comfortable and I can appreciate that. It is stretchy but also rigid and keeps it shape and I absolutely love the magnetic clasp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds up to its expectations!
reviews.reviewText: Use it at work, where I have my tools and a radio strapped to it. Along with holding up my pants. Comfy to wear easy to use. I like the life time warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best belt money can buy!
reviews.reviewText: So with belts you normally have two options:1.) Belts with holes. Now with holes it's easy to remember, use hole 3, use hole 2, and it feels the same every day. However if hole 2 feels tight and 3 feels too loose you're kinda out of luck.2.) Belts without holes. These belts are good for the fact that you can adjust them to any length, but have the downside of it's at a slightly different length almost every day.This belt is set and forget, you will always have the same length every day, but you can adjust it to any length! Not to mention it takes a half of a second to clip it into place. Been wearing to work with a physically active job, it has never gone loose and the clip has never gone undone.Not to mention it's quite stylish too.
